title: Just starting! Anybody trade T206's for modern cards?
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Just starting! Anybody trade T206's for modern cards?
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Trevor
Hi Everybody.

New collector to T206's, so I need all of them.  Would anybody be willing to trade one or two commons from the T206 series for more modern cards? I can e-mail a list of some of the stuff I have to whomever would be interested. Anybody's help would be greatly appreciated. I am just hoping to pick up a couple commons.

Edited per requests to explain more


Cards are mostly 80s, 90s, and 2000s.  

Some cards I have to trade:


1961 Topps Carl Yastremski (G-VG) One Corner Crease
1986 Topps Steve Young RC
2000 Autographics Priest Holmes
2000 Fleer Showcase Legacy Thomas Jones RC #d (2/20)
